alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lewis and Clark and west central Cascade Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Cascade, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cascade, Tower Rock State Park and Craig. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 234 and 268. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central and west central Montana.
